name: @eleven-am/transcoder

scripts.copy: cp package.json dist && cp LICENSE dist && cp README.md dist && cp src/types.d.ts dist/types.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
scripts.push: npm version patch && npm run copy && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.pipeline: npm run build && npm run push

author: Roy OSSAI
description: Transcoder is a library for transcoding video and audio files. It provides a simple and efficient way to convert media files from one format to another, making it easy to work with different file types and codecs. The library supports a wide range of formats and codecs, allowing users to customize their transcoding process to meet their specific needs.
